sentences.en: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums or causing bleeding.
sentences.cn: 牙刷轻轻地刷去齿菌斑，没有伤及牙床或引起出血。

sentences.en: How do you choose your toothbrush?
sentences.cn: 你是如何选择你的牙刷的？

sentences.en: When you travel, don't forget to pack your toothbrush.
sentences.cn: 当你要去旅游时，别忘了带你的牙刷。
